dailyFunStuff.title: A Curious Baby Whale Gives Passengers Their Moment of a Lifetime With its Mother Watching Nearby
dailyFunStuff.content:
A baby grey whale made a whale watcher's day by coming over to her boat to say hi!

Check out the video in the link below!
